div.div: Grinnell College vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: Grinnell wins the toss and defers. LFC will defend east end zone.
Graham Fisher kickoff 65 yards to the LFC00, touchback.
Lake Forest College drive start at 15:00.
Charlie Quinn rush for 2 yards to the LFC27 (TJ Jones).
PENALTY LFC false start 5 yards to the LFC22.
Peter Rantis pass complete to Max Sorby for 8 yards to the LFC30 (Joe Galaske).
Peter Rantis pass incomplete to AnthoneyPrestly.
Jon Gurchak punt 36 yards to the GC34, downed.
Sam Poulos pass complete to Jacob Meixler for 5 yards to the GC39 (Pat Clark).
Sam Poulos pass complete to Jacob Bernholtz for loss of 3 yards to the GC36 (Joey Kropp; Austin VanMeter).
Graham Fisher punt 64 yards to the LFC00, touchback.

Charlie Quinn rush for 21 yards to the LFC41 (Thomas Jones).
